visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Temperature Variation'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include the name 'Temperature' with corresponding data points for January, February, and March. Additionally, specify custom colors for the series and configure the chart with a white background, no legend, and specific margins.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Temperature Variation'. The chart is styled with a white background and specific margins for better visual appeal. The x-axis represents months with categories 'Jan', 'Feb', and 'Mar', while the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius. Both axes are styled with a dark gray color and appropriate font sizes for labels and titles. The data series includes the name 'Temperature' with data points corresponding to the temperature values for each month. The series is colored with a custom teal color. Additionally, data labels are enabled for each data point, displaying the temperature value in degrees Celsius. The legend is disabled to keep the chart clean and focused.
